name: #Selfie
description:
Create copies of yourself using a camera, phasing through filters and interacting with objects to solve puzzles. Features include reflecting projects to reach off places, changing colors to pass obstacles, and epic button pushing.

---

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move, Mouse to Look around

Left Mouse - create a duplicate

Right Mouse - delete current duplicate

Control - pick up and hold object

Space - press button
